mapper.insert: insert into mycalendar (calendar_date, userid, filename, calendar_content) values(#{ calendar_date }, #{userid}, #{filename}, #{calendar_content})
mapper.update: update mycalendar set calendar_date = #{calendar_date}, userid = #{userid}, user_snum = #{user_snum}, calendar_content = #{calendar_content}
mapper.delete: delete from mycalendar where to_char(calendar_date,'YYYYMMDD')=#{ dateFormat } and userid=#{id}
mapper.update: update mycalendar set filename = #{filename}, calendar_content = #{calendar_content} where userid=#{userid} and to_char(calendar_date,'YYYYMMDD')=to_char(#{calendar_date},'YYYYMMDD')
mapper.select: select * from mycalendar where to_char(calendar_date,'YYYYMMDD') = #{ dateFormat } and userid=#{id}
